title: Welcome to the NMDOH COVID-19 Vaccine Registration System.
cleaned_text: Welcome to the NMDOH COVID-19 Vaccine Registration System. Please use this registration system to schedule your COVID-19 Vaccination. Start here. What would you like to do? I want to schedule an appointment online To schedule an appointment online click here and find a location. I want to schedule an appointment by phone To schedule your appointment by phone, call 1-855-600-3453, option 3 Monday - Friday 7 AM to 8 PM, Saturdays and Sundays 10 AM to 4 PM Quick Links & Resources I want to schedule an appointment online Schedule your Appointments, Enter Demographic Information and more. I want to schedule an appointment by phone To schedule your appointment by phone, call 1-855-600-3453, option 3 Monday - Friday 7 AM to 8 PM, Saturdays and Sundays 10 AM to 4 PM I want to view the Vaccination Event Calendar See the latest info on events happening in your area Do you need some help? How does the registration process work? Registering for the COVID-19 vaccine is easy! Learn more about the process here. Frequently asked questions Do you have questions about how to register, appointments and more? Click here to get answers. Do you need additional help? Individuals who have questions or would like support with the registration process - including New Mexicans who do not have internet access - can dial [1-855-600-3453](tel:18556003453) for vaccine questions and technical assistance. The call center is open Monday - Friday 7 AM to 8 PM, Saturdays and Sundays 10 AM to 4 PM.
